assertion: I once fled a swimming pool after accidentally assaulting an old man.
This lives in my workshop and I watered it every day for a month before somebody pointed out that it was plastic .
We got a speeding ticket together whilst test-driving a motorized sofa.
He told me to tone it down a bit when I got a tad too bouncy on his bouncy castle.
I once masterminded a daring heist on a campsite tuck shop.
